## CookiePermanentStorageService class

Implementation of permanent storage using cookies

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CookiePermanentStorageService implements PermanentStorage 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [PermanentStorage](./common.permanentstorage.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get(name)](./common.cookiepermanentstorageservice.get.md) |  | Gets value that was stored with 'name' from permanent storage |
